jobDescription: Mr. Handtruck is looking to fill the following positions:  24’ Box Truck Drivers  Tractor Trailer Drivers  Mechanic for Hydraulic Pumps  Outside sales W/ Car (Bronx)  Outside sales W/ Car (Brooklyn)  Sales Associates  Owner & operator W/ tractor trailer or Box Truck 24-28’  Administrative Assistant BENEFITS: Paid vacation, sick days, personal days, holidays.  Salary will depend on experience & position applied for. Please bring ID & an updated resume.  Mr.Handtruck  1321 Oakpoint Ave.  Bronx, NY 10474 718-861-3300Monday June 25th 1:00-5:00 pm
